Related Character(s): 跂

蚑字的基本解释

蚑
qí
（虫子）爬动：“蠉飞蠕动，蚑行哙息。”
一种小虫：“蚑、蟜、蝼、蚁闻之，拄喙而不能前。”

蚑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qí］
［《廣韻》巨支切，平支，羣。］
［《廣韻》去智切，去寘，溪。］
(1)动物徐行。
(2)引申为虫类。
(3)虫名。蟢蛛。
(4)水蛭的别名。见明李时珍《本草纲目·虫二·水蛭》。
(5)传说中的山精名。
(6)见“蟛蚑”。

蚑字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蚑； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1077第28
【唐韻】巨支切【韻會】翹移切，?音祇。【說文】蚑蚑，蟲行貌。【王褒·洞簫賦】蚑行喘息。【註】凡生類之行皆曰蚑。【成公綏·天地賦】蚑行蠕動，方聚類分。　又蟲名。【古今注】長蚑，蠨蛸也，身小足長，故謂長蚑。　又【正韻】去冀切，音器。亦蟲行貌。　又【類篇】渠羇切，音奇。義同。　【集韻】與跂通。

蚑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蚑字的起名意思

暂无。

Clam
Basic explanation of words
Clam
qí
(Insect) Crawling: "The clams flew and squirmed, and the worms groaned."
A kind of small insect: "The worm, the worm, the worm, the ant smell it, and they can't move forward with their beaks."
Clam
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qí］
["Guangyun" huge branch cut, flat branch, group. ]
["Guangyun" Go to Zhiqie, Go to Zhi, Xi. ]
(1) Animals walk slowly.
(2) Extended to insects.
(3) Insect name. Wing spider.
(4) The alias of leech. See Ming Li Shizhen "Compendium of Materia Medica·Insect Two·Leech".
(5) The legendary name of the mountain spirit.
(6) See "Wedelia".
Clam
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蚑; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1077 28
[Tang Yun] Giant branch cut [Rhyme will] tilt and cut, sound only. [Said the text] worms, the appearance of insects. 【Wang Bao·Dongxiao Fu】The clam walks to breathe. [Note] All life activities are called worms. [Chenggongsui·Tiandi Fu] The worms squirm, and the squares are divided into groups.　 Also known as insects. [Ancient and modern note] Long clams, worms, small body and long feet, so it is called long clams.　[Zheng Yun] Go to Jiqie, the sound instrument. Also insect behavior appearance.　[Classes] Qu Yiqie, the sound is odd. The same meaning.　【Ji Yun】and 跂通.
